panels.title: Maps: Merkle Trees Used Heap (WAN)

panels.description: Local memory cost of the index (for on-heap indexes in OBJECT or BINARY formats, the returned value is just a best-effort approximation and doesnâ€™t indicate a precise on-heap memory usage of the index)
panels.title: Indexes: Memory Cost

panels.description: Number of reads of the locally owned entries
panels.title: Maps: Hits

panels.description: Number of local events received on the map
panels.title: Maps: Events

panels.description: Number of expirations happened on locally owned entries, backups are not included
panels.title: Maps: Expirations
